name: danse macabre (brotatofarm)
description:
CW - Suicide

Escape Satan's dungeon, or die trying! 

(Check your "Mementos" to see how you've died. Collect them all!)

Not complete, but a playable prototype.

CONTROLS

Left Click the environment to interact / pick things up.

Right Click to open the menu and see your items/mementos; try interacting with the items for different results

Made by me, teawench/@unrulycryptid, Vi Pasquarello, and L. Riva, collectively known as Brash Dump.

NOTE - the timer in the corner is currently just for show - nothing will happen if it runs out. Sorry!
